DOC.brief_summary: The investigator test hypothesis two ounce whole-shelled walnuts/day add diet men seek care infertility beneficially affect sperm parameter fertility . The investigator compare walnut intervention commonly suggest recommendation add OTC multivitamin supplement diet .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Walnuts Sperm Parameters Male Fertility
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : The investigator test hypothesis two ounce whole-shelled walnuts/day add diet men oligo- astheno- teratospermia beneficially affect sperm parameter . The investigator find previous study ( Robbins et al . 2012 , Biology Reproduction 87 ( 4 ) :101 , 1-8 . ) walnuts added Western diet improve sperm parameter healthy , young men unknown fertility improvement occur participant poor sperm parameter baseline . The investigator test walnut dietary intervention fertility clinic population know poor sperm parameter . The investigator compare walnut intervention usual care suggestion add OTC multivitamin supplement diet . Neither walnuts OTC multivitamin test efficacy fertility clinic population previously . Methods : A randomized , parallel two-group , dietary intervention trial single-blind masking outcome assessor conduct 140 men present fertility work-up semen parameter 25th centile count , 10th centile motility and/or morphology accord WHO 5th Edition , Laboratory Manual Processing Examining Human Semen , 2010 . Repeated measure baseline 12 week include : semen analysis ( primary outcome ) , blood fatty acid/ nutrient profile ( secondary outcome ) ; IPAQ physical activity questionnaire IIEF index erectile function ( potential modifier confounders ) . Dietary intake assess throughout use 24-hour ASA dietary recall x 5 fertility assess questionnaire one year post enrollment .
DOC.criteria: Age 21 year old Sperm concentration < = 41 million per ml Sperm motility < = 40 % Normal sperm morphology form < = 5.5 % Patients Howard H. Kim , MD see Male Reproductive Medicine Microsurgery Clinic , CedarsSinai Medical Center , Los Angeles , California Have eat walnut throughout life without adverse reaction Allergy walnut tree nut Food allergy Known genetic cause infertility Known anatomical cause infertility History seizure disorder
